notes: B-series full-size van produced 1971-2003. Available as Ram Van (cargo) or Ram Wagon (passenger). B150/B250/B350 weight classes. Conversion vans were popular in 1980s-1990s. Replaced by Mercedes Sprinter-based models. Requires attention to older carburetor systems (pre-1988) vs. fuel injection. Diesel option rare but available 1989-1993. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge B-Series article, January 2025 revision.
